name: Mexican Fiesta! Super-Star Taco Chef - Fastfood Cooking
name_original: Mexican Fiesta! Super-Star Taco Chef - Fastfood Cooking
description:
Holah! Whats up?!

Are you ready for some restaurant action?!

Vamanos! Put on your "can do" attitude and let's start!

Help our Mexican chef fulfill his customers orders.

When customers comes in, accommodate them and immediately take their orders and our chef will begin to cook it!

Be quick in seating and taking orders so that our customers will not get angry and go away.

Just keep on going to help our chef become the best in town!

So what are you waiting for?! Download NOW!
